about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling, bite-sized adventure to the far reaches of the cosmos!

A routine scouting mission to uncover the source of mysterious blue crystals has taken a dramatic turn! Your ship is caught in the crossfire of an intergalactic war on the other side of the universe. Now, you must navigate treacherous alien worlds, engage in pulse-pounding encounters with strange enemies, and solve mind-bending puzzles to find your way back home.

  • Fast-paced action, perfect for quick gaming sessions: Blast through 100 unique, short levels spread across bizarre alien landscapes. Each level offers a condensed burst of excitement, ideal for casual play on the go or during short breaks.

  • Engaging challenges: Test your reflexes and strategic thinking with action-packed combat and clever puzzles that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

  • Unravel a cosmic mystery: A captivating storyline weaves through your journey, revealing the secrets behind the blue crystals and the intergalactic conflict.

Get ready for a wild ride through the cosmos! Add to your wishlist now!

Explore strange worlds.

Engage into fierce fights but be smart and know stop and back off.

Collect hull upgrades and new weapons along the way.

Solve puzzles to proceed forward.

Make unexpected friends. 

Friends that can help you get back home in one piece.

name: Fey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c

short_description: When a scout ship on a mission to find new energy sources ends up in the middle of inter-galactic conflict the only real mission becomes coming back home in one piece. You need to navigate action-drive and face-paced combats, but also solve some unexpected puzzles on your way back.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
